attributes.action: Put a Xmas tree up in Cecil square Margate. It is part of the towns history.
attributes.background: Margate as we all know is not what it used to be. However one thing local people have always loved is the tradition of a Xmas tree in Cecil square. Families, kids, elderly all love to see it and it brightens up an otherwise deprived area.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about Christmas trees are for your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Thanet Council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

https://www.thanet.gov.uk/your-services/how-do-we-make-decisions/how-can-i-have-my-say/petitions/
